site_title: Clamshell Pencil Case by Wilson Lee  (No Glue, No Tape)

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Check out my latest design! it is a Clamshell Pencil Case or Pencil Box designed by Me Wilson Lee @Heap Art . It is possible to fold this origami model with out using any glue or tape. It is purely origami. I hope you'll enjoy this pen case. Paper size : A4 or Letter Size Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art Lover's Ring Tutorial Time Line: 00:00 Demonstration 00:17 Pre-creasing the Horizontal folds on the Paper 03:45 Pre-creasing the Vertical folds on the Paper 08:15 Folding the Cover of the Clamshell Pencil Case 11:18 Folding the Hinge of the Clamshell Pencil Case 15:08 Forming the Base of the Clamshell Pencil Case 18:20 Hinge Adjustments 18:30 The Clamshell Pencil Case
